summary: Google Earth is a program that shows a 3D view of Earth using satellite pictures and maps. You can explore cities and landscapes from different angles on a computer or smartphone. It offers tools to measure distances and even has extra features like a flight simulator and a tool to explore the Moon, Mars, and the night sky. While it's a useful tool, some countries worry about privacy and have banned it, asking Google to blur certain sensitive areas in their images.
title: Google Earth
